analysis: The project is a static website about black holes with existing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The current theme needs to be enhanced with a cosmic black hole aesthetic, including animated objects and slides. The CSS file should incorporate dark, cosmic colors, animations for black hole visuals, and interactive elements. The HTML file should include sections related to black holes, and the JavaScript file should handle the animations and interactions.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Add Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements as described in the intent.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Update the JavaScript file to include event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in the HTML file. Ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, including the mobile menu toggle functionality with smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions.
